name: Milton Nascimento
description:
'''Milton Silva Campos do Nascimento''' ({{IPA|pt|ˈmiwtõ ˈsiwvɐ ˈkɐ̃pus du nasiˈmẽtu}}; born October 26, 1942), also known as '''Bituca''', is a Brazilian singer-songwriter and multi-instrumentalist.

Nascimento has recorded 32 studio albums and has won five [[Grammy Awards]], including [[Best World Music Album]] for his album ''[[Nascimento (album)|Nascimento]]'' in 1998, and twelve [[Brazilian Music Awards]]. He has collaborated with various artists including [[Björk]], [[Pat Metheny]], [[Caetano Veloso]], and [[Elis Regina]].
